name: Musical Squares (pinchysoft)
description:
This is my first game, after using Unity for 1 week! 

This is my submission for the Mix and Jam Game 2020

This is my take on a 2D Arcade Shooter & Musical keys played when you shoot! Try your best to make a tune to the 2 beats (House/EDM and Rock), and with 2 different instruments available (Synth and Electric Guitar). 

Kill the squares quickly before they reach you, and if you kill multiple in a row, gain double the points! 

Have fun :)
